title: 403 forbidden error when trying to sign in via Duo Security
content: I just reinstalled Windows 11 on my PC and Firefox along with it. I tried to access my school Outlook account on Firefox however I keep getting a 403 Forbidden error when it redirects me to Duo Security. Going back one page displays the error code "Authentication access denied" (also on Duo Security). I have tried: - Restarting my PC, both through windows and through a hard reset - Clearing my cache and cookies - using Troubleshooting mode - Allowing Firefox through my Windows firewall - disabling my firewall - changing networks This problem only appears in Firefox, as I am able to log in on Edge.
creator: emrykkw

title: No problem viewing this home page ( https://www.bizjournals.com/nashville/) but clicking on any links using Firefox produces that message: "We couldn’t find the page you were looking for. "  When I switch browsers, everything's fine.
content:
No problem viewing this home page ( https://www.bizjournals.com/nashville/) but clicking on any links using Firefox produces that message: "We couldn’t find the page you were looking for. "

When I switch browsers, everything's fine.

I check this site daily with Firefox and have never had a problem until the last several days. I suspect a Firefox is the issue?
creator: harrisstacy

title: Can't log into my Proton Mail account when I'm in Firefox
content:
Hi -- I'm committed to Firefox as my browser, but I'm having a significant issue. I access my Proton Mail account from Firefox, but for a couple of weeks now I can't log into Proton Mail from Firefox. The browser won't even load the Proton Mail login page; it just spins and a message "Waiting for mail.proton.me" is visible in the lower corner of my Firefox screen.

Fortunately I can still access Proton Mail on my iPhone, but I need it on my Windows laptop too.

Please advise!
creator: knauth
